text:
e="preserve">Syed Muhammad Fazal Agha (; (1946 – 20 May 2020) was a Pakistani politician. He was Governor of Balochistan from August 18 to October 12 1999. He also was Deputy Chairman of the Senate of Pakistan from 1988-1991. from Balochistan. He was a member of the Provincial Assembly of Balochistan from 13 August 2018 till his death.
Agha was born in Killi Huramzai, Pishin District. He died on 20 May 2020 from COVID-19 in Karachi, aged 78.

annotations.surface_form: Deputy Chairman of the Senate of Pakistan
